title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Exporting a ZIP file is slow and does not display a busy cursor during the checkbox update process.
OB: When exporting a ZIP file, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.
EB: When exporting a ZIP file, it should not take a long time to update the checked state of the table. The operation should be faster, and a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the system is working on the update.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the export ZIP functionality.
3. Check some checkboxes to select items for export.
4. Observe that it takes a long time (30 seconds) for the checkboxes to update.
5. During this time, a busy cursor should be visible.
